H0.text: In which occupation would you rotate the gog at the end of your nose. Glassblower

H1.text: In which occupation would you rotate the gog at the end of your nose. Blacksmith

H2.text: In which occupation would you rotate the gog at the end of your nose. Surgeon

H3.text: In which occupation would you rotate the gog at the end of your nose. Punty

A4.text: Skilled workers are capable of shaping almost any vessel forms by rotating the pipe, swinging it and controlling the temperature of the piece while they blow.

A5.text: The major tools used by a glassblower are the blowpipe (or blow tube), punty (or punty rod, pontil, or mandrel), bench, marver, blocks, jacks, paddles, tweezers, newspaper pads, and a variety of shears.
